name: Floor is Lava (gamerstringslinger)
description:
This is my first attempt at making a 2d game, and writing my own code in Unity.

You have 60 seconds to survive.... FLOOR IS LAVA. 

Controls: Arrow keys to move (one tile at a time)

Play full screen to avoid display issues....

3 difficulty levels. Luck difficulty is very hard (hence the name!)

Credits:
Assets are from the unity store, thank you to the amazing people there:

tiki ted: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/55726 (player sprite - luchadore)
brackeys: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/3947 (2d mega pack)
muz station productions: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/4078 (battle music)
alchemy studio music: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/755 (music and sfx)
n-hance studio: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/41401 (low poly texture pack)
